mapper.select: select file_no , origin_name , change_name , file_path from attachment where ref_no = #{productNo}
select order_no , tracking , order_date , cash_type , total_price , status from orders where user_no = ${userNo}

select order_no , user_id , order_date , cash_type , total_price , o.status , o.address , tracking from orders o join member using (user_no)
where order_no like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or user_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or user_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where o.status = 'Y'
select order_no , user_id , order_date , cash_type , total_price , o.status , o.address , tracking from orders o join member using (user_no) where order_no = #{orderNo}

select order_no , od.product_no , thumbnail , product_name , option_name , volume , price + (select price from options o where o.product_no = od.product_no and o.option_name = od.option_name) as "price" , (price + (select price from options o where o.product_no = od.product_no and o.option_name = od.option_name)) * volume as "total_price" from order_detail od join product p on (od.product_no = p.product_no) where order_no = #{orderNo}

select report_no , user_id as "reporter_id" , guilty , report_content , report_date , ref_no , (select board_title from (select board_no, board_title from board union all select tboard_no, tboard_title from t_board union all select review_no, review_content from review) where board_no = ref_no) as "report_title" , result from report join member on (user_no = reporter)
where result = 'N'
order by report_no desc

select report_no , (select user_id from member where user_no = reporter) as "reporter_id" , (select user_id from member where user_no = suspect) as "suspect_id" , suspect , guilty , report_content , report_date , ref_no , (select board_title from (select board_no, board_title from board union all select tboard_no, tboard_title from t_board union all select review_no, review_content from review) where board_no = ref_no) as "report_title" ,result from report join member on (user_no = reporter) where report_no = #{reportNo}
mapper.update: update report set result = 'Y' where report_no = #{reportNo}
